column1: 2123,"Film, Television, Radio and Stage Directors",,"Determine technical requirements of productions or projects
column5: Collaborate with others to determine technical details of productions
column7: Coordinate logistics for productions or events
column9: Study scripts to determine project requirements
column13: Collaborate with others to prepare or perform artistic productions
column15: Review details of technical drawings or specifications
column21: Discuss production content and progress with others
column27: Set up and operate lighting equipment
column29: Manage content of broadcasts or presentations
column31: Select staff, team members or performers
column35: Operate still or video cameras or related equipment
column37: Edit audio, photographs or video recordings
column47: Audition or interview potential performers or staff members
